summary: The Wikimedia Foundation (WMF) is a non-profit organization that runs Wikipedia, a very popular website. It was started by Jimmy Wales in 2003 to support his online projects. WMF also manages other websites like Wiktionary and Wikibooks. They rely on small donations from people who use their websites and get help from volunteers to create and manage the content. The foundation has a big team and lots of money to keep improving these projects.
title: Wikimedia Foundation
